hibernate-mapping.query: from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice01 where notice01.id = ( select max (id) from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice02 where notice02.ancestorID = :ancestorID )
from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice01 where notice01.id = ( select max (id) from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice02 where notice02.name = :name )

from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice01 where notice01.id = ( select max (id) from edu.osu.cws.evals.models.Notice as notice02 where notice01.ancestorID = notice02.ancestorID ) order by ancestorID
